title: Two 12-year-olds charged in shooting death of teen boy in Winston-Salem
content:
To view this page ensure that Adobe Flash Player version 10.2.0 or greater is installed.
Friends and family are remembering Jose Angel Chegue Mendoza as a “good kid.” The 15-year-old was shot in an open area behind the Progressive Apostolic Church at 432 Crews St. — not far from his home — around 8:45 p.m. Friday, police said.
Montgomery said he didn’t know if investigators had recovered the gun used in the shooting.
